org.fcrepo.kernel.impl

Class FedoraResourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.FedoraResourceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FedoraJcrTypes, FedoraResource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContainerImpl, FedoraBinaryImpl, NonRdfSourceDescriptionImpl, TombstoneImpl

    public class FedoraResourceImpl
extends org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
implements FedoraJcrTypes, FedoraResource
    Common behaviors across Container and NonRdfSourceDescription types; also used when the exact type of an object is irrelevant
    Author:
    ajs6f

      • setURIProperty

        public void setURIProperty(String relPath,
                           URI value)
        Set the given property value for this resource as a URI, without translating any URIs that appear to be references to repository resources. Using untranslated URIs to refer to repository resources will disable referential integrity checking, but also allows referring to resources that do not exist, have been deleted, etc.
        Specified by:
        setURIProperty in interface FedoraResource
        Parameters:
        relPath - the given path
        value - the URI value

      • updateProperties

        public void updateProperties(IdentifierConverter<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource,FedoraResource> idTranslator,
                             String sparqlUpdateStatement,
                             RdfStream originalTriples)
                      throws MalformedRdfException,
                             javax.jcr.AccessDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: FedoraResource
        Update the provided properties with a SPARQL Update query. The updated properties may be serialized to the JCR store. After applying the statement, clients SHOULD check the result of #getDatasetProblems, which may include problems when attempting to serialize the data to JCR.
        Specified by:
        updateProperties in interface FedoraResource
        Parameters:
        idTranslator - the property of idTranslator
        sparqlUpdateStatement - sparql update statement
        originalTriples - original triples
        Throws:
        MalformedRdfException - if malformed rdf exception occurred
        javax.jcr.AccessDeniedException - if access denied in updating properties

      • getEtagValue

        public String getEtagValue()
        Description copied from interface: FedoraResource
        Construct an ETag value from the last modified date and path. JCR has a mix:etag type, but it only takes into account binary properties. We actually want whole-object etag data. TODO : construct and store an ETag value on object modify
        Specified by:
        getEtagValue in interface FedoraResource
        Returns:
        constructed etag value
